alert.note: Alert for Clay; Owen; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:22AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vigo, Clay, northwestern Owen, Parke, southern Vermillion, western Putnam and southwestern Montgomery Counties through NOON EDT... At 1122 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Clinton to near Dennison to near West Union. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clinton around 1130 AM EDT. Rockville around 1140 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Terre Haute, Brazil and Greencastle. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 1 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for west central Indiana.
